data.actual_result: No audio is played when screenshared.
data.expected_result: Call of Cthulhu's audio should come through for the viewers.
data.short_description: Call of Cthulhu does not screenshare with audio.
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch app/game, Call of Cthulhu - Open screenshare with audio - Share the game in windowed mode - Sound not shared
